definition: down/downwards/below/lower/later/next (week etc)/second (of two parts)/to decline/to go down/to arrive at (a decision, conclusion etc)/measure word to show the frequency of an action
body/life/oneself/personally/one's morality and conduct/the main part of a structure or body/pregnant/classifier for sets of clothes: suit, twinset/Kangxi radical 158
to get off one's high horse (idiom)/to dispense with posturing (and adopt a more humble or empathetic attitude)

sentences.english: But Jesus bowing himself down, wrote with his finger on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 耶稣却弯下身去，用指头在地上画字。

sentences.english: I bent down and so did he, and we bashed heads.
sentences.chinese: 我弯下身子，他也一样，我们的头重重地碰在了一起。

sentences.english: The tall man bent forward to listen to the little girl.
sentences.chinese: 那高个男子弯下身来听那小女孩的话。

sentences.english: The Ruler body shape is usually equally thin from bottom to top.
sentences.chinese: 直尺型身材通常上下身均瘦。

sentences.english: And he reached down and touched her - and gave her life.
sentences.chinese: 他俯下身，抚摸着她，给了她生命。

sentences.english: I leaned over and touched my forehead to hers.
sentences.chinese: 我俯下身，用我的前额贴着她的额头。

sentences.english: He felt his backache and didn't hunker down.
sentences.chinese: 他感到背很痛，而且蹲不下身。

sentences.english: Mike felt a wave of joy as he leaned over and kissed his wife.
sentences.chinese: 当迈克弯下身亲吻他的妻子时，他感觉到一阵兴奋。

sentences.english: Bodice is tight and form-fitting, waist skirt is loose, forming a cone-shaped modeling.
sentences.chinese: 女装上身紧身合体，下身宽松，形成一种圆锥状造型。

sentences.english: Ham laid Yue on the floor and bent over to kiss him on his shapely chest.
sentences.chinese: 灏明把栎鑫放在地板上，弯下身亲吻他漂亮的胸膛。

sentences.english: Calves are one of the most neglected muscles in the lower body.
sentences.chinese: 犊牛是一个最被忽视的肌肉在下身。

sentences.english: She bent over the baby and kissed it.
sentences.chinese: 她弯下身去吻了吻那婴儿。

sentences.english: She bent over and kissed him again.
sentences.chinese: 她再度弯下身来吻着他。

sentences.english: He bent down and touched the tray.
sentences.chinese: 他弯下身来，触摸了下托盘。

definition: lower half of one's body/Lower Body (Chinese poetry movement of the early 21st century)
collar/neckband/neckline/the place where the two ends of a collar meet
